teacheasy.xml

Class XMLHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • teacheasy.xml.XMLHandler

  • public class XMLHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles XML reading and writing whilst maintaining info about file locations (recent files).
    Version:
    1.0 05 Feb 2015
    Author:
    Alistair Jewers
